q: "I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better!" Eric Schmidt wrote in Google Inc. 's official blog post. Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt , a former Novell executive, has led the company since 2001.
